long_description: Designed for small adults and children, the Perception Prodigy XS combines recreational performance with feature-rich value. Easy to paddle no matter your level of expertise, the Prodigy XS is ideal for beginners seeking leisurely voyages on flatwater and slow rivers. 23 in. width enhances confidence thanks to its excellent stability. Roomy cockpit makes it easy to get in and out of the kayak. Soft yet supportive padded seating offers superb comfort, and an adjustable back pad personalizes the height and the angle of recline. Padded area along the interior combing increases comfort for your legs, and adjustable leg support reduces ankle pressure. Slidelock footrail system is easily adjustable, comfortable and rugged; footbraces adjust via extension rod that places positioning at your fingertips. Shockcords on bow store bulky accessories such as a PFD, bilge pump or spray jacket (accessories not included). Soft-to-the-touch carry handles ease transport of the 27 lb. Perception Prodigy XS to the water.
